extraServices.title: Cancun Overflight
extraServices.content: Enjoy this amazing experience and see cancun from a new perspective. Fly over Cancun Hotel Zone and Bahia Mujeres where you will enjoy a beautiful view and an amazing blue color.
extraServices.additionalInfo:
Flight Time: 20 min
Departure point: Cancun Airport

extraServices.title: Holbox 24 hrs
extraServices.content:
No matter if you are arriving late our service 24 hrs let you reach Holbox even at night by land.

In case you don't want overnight in cancun and you desire go to Holbox the same day this is excellent option.
extraServices.additionalInfo:
What does include?
- Ground Transportation to Chiquila
- Private boat from Chiquila to Holbox

extraServices.title: Stay at Cancun Airport
extraServices.content:
If your arrival at Cancun airport is very late or your departure is very early, you have the option of spending the night at Cancun Airport and catching your flight early the next day. You will be just minutes away from the 4 terminals. We offer the best rooms.

Breakfast included.
extraServices.additionalInfo: Make your reservation with us through whatsApp or email at info@holboxair.com.
